title: Computer is slow
body:
So my computer runs league with average of 20-30fps, and drops down to 5-10 when a team has baron or in a major teamfight. I want to know what to upgrade to make my computer run league faster. Not sure what to put for computer specs, so :


OS Name	Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
Version	10.0.14393 Build 14393
Other OS Description 	Not Available
OS Manufacturer	Microsoft Corporation
System Name	-PC
System Manufacturer	System manufacturer
System Model	System Product Name
System Type	x64-based PC
System SKU	To Be Filled By O.E.M.
Processor	AMD Phenom(tm) 9600 Quad-Core Processor, 2300 Mhz, 4 Core(s), 4 Logical Processor(s)
BIOS Version/Date	American Megatrends Inc. 0401, 7/4/2008
SMBIOS Version	2.5
Embedded Controller Version	255.255
BIOS Mode	Legacy
BaseBoard Manufacturer	ASUSTeK Computer INC.
BaseBoard Model	Not Available
BaseBoard Name	Base Board
Platform Role	Desktop
Secure Boot State	Unsupported
PCR7 Configuration	Binding Not Possible
Windows Directory	C:\WINDOWS
System Directory	C:\WINDOWS\system32
Boot Device	\Device\HarddiskVolume1
Locale	United States
Hardware Abstraction Layer	Version = "10.0.14393.0"
User Name	-PC\A
Time Zone	Pacific Daylight Time
Installed Physical Memory (RAM)	6.00 GB
Total Physical Memory	6.00 GB
Available Physical Memory	4.04 GB
Total Virtual Memory	7.37 GB
Available Virtual Memory	5.10 GB
Page File Space	1.37 GB
Page File	C:\pagefile.sys
Hyper-V - VM Monitor Mode Extensions	Yes
Hyper-V - Second Level Address Translation Extensions	Yes
Hyper-V - Virtualization Enabled in Firmware	Yes
Hyper-V - Data Execution Protection	Yes

replies.body:
Hmm, it looks like your system specs are meeting the [minimum and recommended system requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/). It sounds like there may be driver issues or windows power settings that are causing this to happen. I recommend working through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
